criterionScores.rationale: Strong problem validation from JTBD interviews. 8 out of 10 interviewees confirmed the wine discovery problem is painful and they actively look for solutions.
Moderate willingness to pay. 50% of survey respondents indicated they would pay €25/month for a curated wine subscription. Price sensitivity exists but acceptable conversion expected.
criterionScores.dataSource: Pricing validation survey (N=50), Competitor pricing analysis

criterionScores.rationale: SOM calculated at €1.5M based on conservative assumptions. Wine subscription market in NL growing 15% YoY. TAM €50M, SAM €10M with 15% obtainable market share.
criterionScores.dataSource: CBS wine market data, Competitor revenue estimates, Industry reports

criterionScores.rationale: Moderate differentiation through personalized curation algorithm and educational content. 3 main competitors exist but focus on volume over personalization.
criterionScores.dataSource: Competitive analysis (5 competitors), Value proposition testing

criterionScores.rationale: Fully feasible with current tech stack. Next.js 14 + Supabase + Mollie are proven technologies. No custom ML needed initially (rule-based matching). Timeline: 3 months to MVP.
criterionScores.dataSource: Technical architecture review, Team capability assessment
keyFindings: No external dependencies or integrations blocking
Timeline: 3 months to MVP, 6 months to public launch

criterionScores.rationale: CAC €50 via Instagram/Google Ads, conversion rate 2%. Channels are viable but require optimization. LTV €200 provides acceptable unit economics.
criterionScores.dataSource: Instagram ads test (€200 budget, 50 clicks), Google Ads test (€300 budget)

criterionScores.rationale: Strong unit economics. LTV/CAC ratio of 4.0, contribution margin 45%. AOV €75, COGS €40 (wine + shipping), CAC €50. Break-even at 300 subscribers.
criterionScores.dataSource: Unit economics model, Supplier pricing agreements

criterionScores.rationale: Strong team capability. 2 FTE developers (Next.js/React), 0.5 FTE designer (Figma/UI), 1 FTE product owner. Missing: wine sommelier expertise (can hire part-time).
criterionScores.dataSource: Team skill matrix, Resource allocation plan
